text: The statistical regions of Slovenia (, singular: ) are 12 administrative sub- divisions (NUTS 3 level) created in Slovenia in May 2005 for legal and statistical purposes. In total there are 12 statistical regions in Slovenia. These 12 statistical regions are grouped in two groups (NUTS-2 level): Eastern Slovenia () and Western Slovenia () From 1 January 2015, the name of the Spodnjeposavska statistical region changes to Posavska and the name of Notranjsko-kraška to Primorsko-notranjska.
